hanzi-su-wiki:
臓

Значения

Внутренние органы

Мнемоника

Органы 月, скрытые 蔵 в теле, внутренности.

Варианты

臟, 脏

rtega_mnemonic:
臟臟RS
脏脏		臓internal organs, viscera
  • hidden 藏/蔵 in flesh 月
  • ⓢ things housed 庄 in the flesh 月
heisig_constituent: entrails, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, storehouse, flowers, parade, retainer, slave
koohiiStory1: You signed your organ donor card, right? So, when you die, your entrails and other body parts will be placed in a storehouse.
koohiiStory2: Again with the Pyramids, each Pharaoh had their entrails taken out and put into little jars that were shaped in the forms of their Gods and entombed along with the preserved body. So, the entrails are the parts of the body that are placed in the storehouse along with the Pharaoh! Damnit, why can´t they always be this easy? :(.
jp_example_words:
内臓(ないぞう): internal organs, intestines, viscera
心臓(しんぞう): heart
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your moon storehouse is another storehouse you own. Remember how your regular storehouse holds zombies (from the kanji 蔵?). Your moon storehouse is on the moon, and it is filled with internal organs.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Your moon storehouse has internal organs because 1) you have to keep them far away from the zombies or they'll go berserk, and 2) you think it's funny to see them bounce around in low gravity. Boing, boing, boing, haha look at that internal organ.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Where did you get all these internal organs from? You actually harvested them from the zombies (ぞう) from your other storehouse.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Basically, you store zombies in your regular storehouse, harvest their organs, then launch them into space where they are put into a storehouse on the moon where the zombies will never be able to find them again.
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 艾 (мокса), 戈 (копьё), 月 (месяц), 臣 (вассал)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the storehouse (蔵) body part (⺼) is the entrails

Name meaning

zàng
яп. вм. 脏
Radicals: 月, 蔵  (moon, storehouse)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your moon storehouse is another storehouse you own. Remember how your regular storehouse holds zombies (from the kanji 蔵?). Your moon storehouse is on the moon, and it is filled with internal organs.
Your moon storehouse has internal organs because 1) you have to keep them far away from the zombies or they'll go berserk, and 2) you think it's funny to see them bounce around in low gravity. Boing, boing, boing, haha look at that internal organ.
Reading Mnemonic
Where did you get all these internal organs from? You actually harvested them from the zombies (ぞう) from your other storehouse.
Basically, you store zombies in your regular storehouse, harvest their organs, then launch them into space where they are put into a storehouse on the moon where the zombies will never be able to find them again.
